paragraphs.body: You guys do realize that to put half of the best stuff from IRC on here would mean violating nearly every rule Wikia and the Avatar Wiki have on swearing and basic human decency, right? A Light Shining in the Darkness - Talk   04:40, April 23, 2012 (UTC)
